query:
SELECT DISTINCT mes, ano, COUNT(*) as num_lojas 
FROM resultados_mensais 
GROUP BY mes, ano 
ORDER BY ano DESC, mes DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT DISTINCT mes, ano, COUNT(*) as num_lojas 
FROM resultados_mensais 
GROUP BY mes, ano 
ORDER BY ano DESC, mes DESC
